divs: Sighting DetailsOkay. I had just had a long and stressful going away party. I was sad because we are moving, and I love our current house. So, I started taking pictures of trees that I will miss, outside of my house. Then I saw something zigzagging in the sky and I thought it was a pinecone falling off a tree. Then I took a picture of it and it sped away. I was creeped out and was light headed. I put it on my computer and I saw that it looked like a kind of triangle. But then I zoomed in and saw it was circular with something on the side.
Summary: I Was Taking a Picture of the Sky and a strange UFOlike object showed up in it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Saratoga
There were no other sightings in Saratoga on or around July 20th 0001
This sighting has never been favorited.
